string.name: instructions
string.i: \"Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.\"

string.name: instruction_start
string.b: "Press the button below and read the following:"

resources.string: "Press the button below and read the following:"

Characteristics of Parkinson's disease detected. We advise you to see a doctor.


The nearest doctor is Dr. Novak at UKC Ljubljana. Phone number
041 111 111
